root.title: schult home corp make initi stock offer
root.body: schult home corp announc initi public offer 833,334 unit five dlr per unit say janney montgomeri scott inc woolcott co manag underwrit offer say unit consist one common share one warrant buy one-half share common warrant entitl holder buy one-half common share 5.50 dlr per full share march one 1988 septemb one 1989 thereaft 6.50 dlr per full share march 1991 say
